Food Grade

ISO tanks provide a great platform for transport and sanitation for the food & beverage industry. Surfaces and valves are detergent washed, cleaned, buffed, and passivated to achieve a clean, dry interior free of prior cargo odor, residue, and any transferable stains.

Passivation is 100% and all gaskets and seals are replaced with PTFE (Teflon).

ROAM Tank Innovations is a leader in the Honey industry! We provide several types of tanks and customized options for all heating, cooling and blending of materials.

These tanks have become more and more popular with bee farmers and honey packers due to our innovative blending methods and mixing systems. Built for transport, ISO tanks have a very long life span and have never leaked in storage applications.

Chemical & Petroleum

Stainless Steel VS Carbon Steel and Plastic

  • Corrosion Resistance: Resist water treatment, chemicals, and can easily tolerate abrasive wash-down solvents. They will never rust!
  • Temperature Tolerance: Not impacted by excessive temperatures or UV exposure. They maintain their shape and are easy to fill/empty in all weather environments.
  • Value: Easily fabricated, maintenance free, and maintain their integrity over the long haul. They are an asset, NOT an expense.
  • Recyclable: The eco-friendly tank choice. Stainless materials can be reclaimed to help reduce environmental impact, plastics cannot. Unlike carbon steel they will not react with the contents and contaminate the metal.​
  • Fire Safety: Resist flames for over seven (7) minutes! Under the same testing conditions poly-composite tanks are compromised in just ninety (90) seconds!
  • Ready to use upon arrival: Our ISO tanks come with a three (3) inch bottom discharge valve that can be locked, twenty (20) inch manway, pressure safety relief valves, air purge/vent valves, heat channels, and two (2) inches of insulation.

ROAU 78's

Specialty Tanks

We offer you a more cost effective way to process for smaller in-house operations. Perfect for maple syrup farmers, honey farmers, distillers and much more!

  • Maximum door clearance being 96 inches by 96 inches required the tank to enter the room horizontal and then be tiltable.
  • Required both horizontal and vertical fork pockets at the perfect midpoint to be tiltable.
  • Maximum height in refrigerated room was 12 feet. The tank was sized for 11 foot 6 inch allowance for a 3 inch bottom discharge.

Aseptic

Aseptic tanks utilize vacuum loading and discharge for the transportation of bulk foods.

Examples of products transported in aseptic tanks are:

  • Concentrated Fruit Juice
  • Food & Beverage Colorants
  • Dairy Products
  • Alcoholic Beverages
  • Sweeteners
  • Variety of Edible Oils

Super Custom

Vertical Tanks

ROAM Tank Innovations also offers vertical tank conversions to maximize your floor space. The process takes between 4-6 weeks for a standard size tank.

However if you have height constraints we can create a super custom tank to meet your needs.

Mixers, reactors, separators are all common use cases for vertical tanks.

Tank Haulers

Chassis

Need a chassis to pick up your tank, or just for your day to day transportation? We have plenty of affordable used and refurbished chassis to choose based on your needs!
